text: In a word, Frederick Cuvier's Sperm Whale is not a Sperm Whale, but of moderate size, by no means rapturously grateful for that destiny yet, when would she begin to be interested in me? #MobyDick

passages.full_quote: Moreover, at a place in Yorkshire, England, Burton Constable by name, a certain Sir Clifford Constable has in his possession the skeleton of <used>a Sperm Whale, but of moderate size, by no means</used> of the full-grown magnitude of my friend King Tranquo's

passages.full_quote: Then I thought if she were, as I feared, <used>by no means rapturously grateful for that destiny yet, when would she begin to be interested in me</used>
